inclusion.criterion: obesity or overweight with weight-related comorbidity
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: BMI 34, high TSH level (13 mU/L), low free T4 level (0.2 ng/dl)

inclusion.criterion: stable treatment regimen for weight-related comorbidity
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of dementia or psychotic disorder

exclusion.criterion: serious or unstable general medical illnesses
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: BMI 34, high TSH level (13 mU/L), low free T4 level (0.2 ng/dl)

exclusion.criterion: medullary thyroid cancer or Multiple Endocrine Neoplasia syndrome type 2
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: pregnant, nursing or intend to become pregnant
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: age 33, no mention of pregnancy or breastfeeding
